Yeah, the H2, H4, Olympus LS-10, etc. are really meant for recording of ev=
ents such as live music where you need decent quality stereo recordings. We=
 here are probably not so interested in stereo recordings.

I see the LS-10=
 is available at Amazon now for $199. This is quite cheaper than when it fi=
rst came out. Little Steven recommends that unit.

Zack
